All Implemented Interfaces:
de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.EntityRenderedListener, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.EntityRenderListener, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.ICollisionEntity, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.ICombatEntity, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.IEntity, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.IUpdateable, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.tweening.Tweenable, EventListener
public class Door extends de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.Prop implements de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.IUpdateable
Represents a radiation-based punishment that uses a shared static countdown timer across all radiation tiles. The countdown ticks globally, ensuring that walking across multiple radiation tiles does not reset the timer.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the door each tick. Automatically attaches the corresponding button when first updated.
      Specified by:
      update in interface de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.IUpdateable

    • createAnimationController

      protected de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.graphics.animation.IEntityAnimationController<?> createAnimationController()
      Creates the animation controller that manages the door's animations, including open, opening, and closed states.
      Overrides:
      createAnimationController in class de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.Prop
      Returns:
      the custom DoorAnimationController

    • isOpen

      public boolean isOpen()
      Returns whether the door is currently open.
      Returns:
      true if open, false if closed

    • open

      public void open()
      Opens the door if it is currently closed and disables collision.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the door if it is currently open and enables collision.

    • getButton

      public Button getButton()
      Returns the button associated with this door, if any.
      Returns:
      the linked Button, or null if not yet attached
